website_summaries.verdict: Create a sound all your own with a full-featured modeling amp for electric, acoustic, and bass guitars.
pros: Hundreds of effects and 16 amp presets make this Line 6 one of the most flexible, creatively-inspiring speakers on the market
Features 20 watts of power projected through an 8-inch speaker, and the micro USB port facilitates easy recording and editing on a variety of devices
Can be played through headphones for quiet practice as well
cons: The sheer amount of technology may overwhelm new players

customer_reviews.title: best amp for the price period
customer_reviews.text: It was almost like learning guitar all over all the things you can do with this amp with out effects pedals. Built in tuner. Many options. Pure clean strong sound from this amp especially at low volumes. Solid buy. Could not be happier I went with this brand
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: The app doesn't work on droid. Here's how to use the included cubase 9.5 recording software
customer_reviews.text: The remote app doesn't work on droid. If you want to use the amp as an interface for the cubase recording software that comes with the amp you need to do a few things. Once you select which type of track you want to record ( eg: distorted guitar and vocals) you need to go into studio-studio setup-vst audio system, and from there go to asio driver and select spider v. Then you can back out select the amp as your input an/or output. Also know, this software is very buggy, problematic and not worth one dollar. At least this garbageware is free.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Considerably better than the MicroCube I had been using despite the lower price. I have an 8-string (Ibanez RG8) and this amp brings out the deeper tones in a way that portable amps cannot. Effect presets work like a charm. I expected a TS (1/4") output jack, but there's only a standard headphone jack (3.5mm). No aux in, either. Not a problem per se, but not what I expected. On the whole, I am extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jt

customer_reviews.title: The price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Good practice amp for the money. Coolest thing about it is the built in tuner. I no longer have to have my digital tuner set up. Lots of features. I use an old school ehx tone tat and it sounds decent for such a small speaker . For the price u can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: +MF+

customer_reviews.title: The Amplifier Spider V 20 is a great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and he was definitely happy with the quality of this product and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: LCerrato

customer_reviews.title: Nice Practice amp ☺
customer_reviews.text: Nice little practice amp, especially with the Spider remote app. The tuner...well, I'll stick with my chromatic clip on tunner, mainly because sometimes I tune certain strings to a higher or lower pitch and I like to actually see the scale increments. :)
customer_reviews.author: Randy Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who began playing about a year and a half ago. He LOVES it. He loves all of the sound options and the quality. Would recommend for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Got the amp and was excited until I plugged in. Power worked but the speaker did not. Return policy was easy though.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice small amp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this amp for my son. He really enjoys it. It is very good for what it is. He uses it in his bedroom for practicing. It is a very good amp for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Bechler

customer_reviews.title: Good job Line 6
customer_reviews.text: Totally awesome product for beginners who want to take it to the next level. Just fun to play along the effects and find the right tune for you. Got it today and for the price/product, i can't be any more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Moughty

customer_reviews.title: Good amp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 8 yr old. He loves it!! Its not very big or bulky and its LOUD!! Prefect size for my 8 yr old!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tone and control. Would benefit from two inputs and an output.
customer_reviews.author: DUSTIN H.

customer_reviews.title: Solid little amp
customer_reviews.text: Solid little amp for playing around the house, versatile with really no need to dig out any other effects.
customer_reviews.author: RT419

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this. Had a line 6 spider practice amp years ago and thought this would be similar. Not sure what they did but I could not get a decent tone to save my life, even using the software. Decided to swallow the cost and bought a boss katana 50w instead. There are better options so stay clear of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different tones
customer_reviews.text: Nice little practice amp. Well worth the money! Be sure to order a Micro USB 2.0 OTG Cable Flat On The Go Adapter Micro USB Male to USB Female so you can use the phone app!
customer_reviews.author: dandude

customer_reviews.title: Great practice amp
customer_reviews.text: This little amp has a lot of sound. Great practice amp. Very easy to use and get great sounds right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Butler

customer_reviews.title: Only works when it wants too
customer_reviews.text: Randomly decideds to stop working some days no sound at all I'll turn it on it off a couple times and nothing come back three days later and try again and it works fine it has dont that several times even at low volume and started a week after I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Keifer ruthardt

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: As a "newbie" i really enjoyed the intuitiveness of the amp. I enjoy setting the FX for background and then playing along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Stone

customer_reviews.title: Rock star in the house.
customer_reviews.text: We now have a rock star in the house. Clear sound. Great quality to sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michele C.

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you download the app for your phone you have worlds of control over your sound. Good for practice and recording
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But it!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best room amplifiers I've come across in my life, and I've played on more than 40 different of these types. It's better than fender mustang 20.
customer_reviews.author: JayR

customer_reviews.title: Not great for acoustic
customer_reviews.text: I currently play an acoustic-electric, but bought this amp in anticipation of getting an electric guitar. This way I can just use one amp for both guitars. I haven't gotten my electric guitar yet, but I've spent weeks fighting with this amp to get a usable tone for my acoustic-electric. I'm spending way too much time on this when my acoustic amp, a small Laney LA10, gives me a great tone right away. Maybe it's great for electric guitars, but it's way too much work for an acoustic-electric.
customer_reviews.author: flux1968

product_meta.title: Line 6 Guitar Combo Amplifier (Spider V 20)
product_meta.description: The Spider V 20 amp has been designed to sound great right out of the box, and its easy-to-use controls and compact size make it the ideal practice amp for any guitarist beginners to seasoned professionals. Select one of 16 tonally-diverse amp and effect presets, then use the intuitive interface to quickly tweak that tone to your personal taste if you'd like. Each preset contains three effects that can be switched in and out stomp box-style using the dedicated FX buttons on the front panel. Turning the reverb knob adds atmosphere and depth to your sound, and you can tap in delay times and modulation rates with the tap/tuner button. Press and hold the button to access the onboard tuner. A micro USB port makes it easy to connect the Spider V 20 amp to your Mac or PC, or iOS and Android device, where you can edit your tones via the free Spider V remote app, or record your performances with the included Steinberg Cubase LE DAW.
feature_bullets: 20-Watt Modeling guitar amp with 8" Custom speaker
16 presets with 3 simultaneous effects and independent reverb
Acoustic guitar and bass presets included
Micro USB port for editing and recording on Mac, PC, iOS, and Android

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars84 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
